val:
Do you sometimes doubt your skills or competence? Do you think others perceive you to be more intelligent than you really are? Do you feel like an imposter or fraud when you achieve something? Do you attribute your success to luck or coincidence? If the answer is yes - then, my friend, you sometimes showcase imposter syndrome. In this post, I summarize my ways of tackling my own imposter syndrome.

Originally published by Shilpi Agrawal on Twitter.
